text: ella orea manusyanreyum munnilum pinnilum avannayi niyeagikkappetta melneattakkarunt. allahuvinre kalpana prakaram avaravane srad'dhiccukeantirikkunnu. allahu oru janatayuteyum avasthayil marram varuttukayilla; avar tannalute sthiti svayam marrunvare. ennal allahu oru janatakk valla duritavum varuttanuddesiccal arkkum at tatukkanavilla. avanekkutate avarkk raksakanumilla
